settings.text: At SportsLive, we specialize in providing comprehensive logo and brand design services tailored to elevate your business. Our expert team of designers and branding professionals work closely with you to create a unique and memorable brand identity that resonates with your target audience. We offer a full suite of services, including custom logo design, brand strategy development, color palette selection, typography, and visual style guidelines. Whether you're launching a new business or rebranding an existing one, we ensure that your brand stands out with a cohesive and professional look. Our goal is to help you build a strong brand presence that reflects your values, engages your customers, and drives your business forward.

settings.heading: How long does it take to get my order?
settings.row_content:
Most Decal orders take 5 to 8 business days once design is approved.

All other projects which include, flags, banners, signs, car wraps, and trophies; 10-14 business days upon receiving final payment.

settings.heading: Can I order just one custom decal set?
settings.row_content: No, but we do offer a collectors set that will include custom art, and 2 full sets.Click here to purchase

settings.heading: What is the minimum order for custom  decals?
settings.row_content: The minimum order is 15 sets for team orders. The minimum order is 18 sets for mini helmet decals. $200minimumfor custom acrylic trophies.

settings.heading: Do we charge for designing?
settings.row_content: Your design work is part of your project, there is no separate charge for design.
